CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such NTbased polymers exhibit 1 order of magnitude increased hole mobility in conjunction with obviously improved photovoltaic properties with respect to the corresponding BT version , which can be ascribed to the centrosymmetric structure of NT that can lead to straighter backbone and more favorable side - chain placement than the axisymmetric BT structure.

Let's think step by step.

1. NT-based polymers
2. NT (presumably stands for Nanotube or Nanotubes)
3. Corresponding BT version
4. BT (presumably stands for another type of polymer, possibly axisymmetric)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "NT-based polymers" and "corresponding BT version" or "BT polymers".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. NT-based polymers
2. BT polymers

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "NT-based polymers" and "BT polymers".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NT-based polymers |
| BT polymers |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such NTbased polymers exhibit 1 order of magnitude increased hole mobility in conjunction with obviously improved photovoltaic properties with respect to the corresponding BT version , which can be ascribed to the centrosymmetric structure of NT that can lead to straighter backbone and more favorable side - chain placement than the axisymmetric BT structure.

Let's think step by step.

1. NT-based polymers: This is a type of polymer. It is not explicitly stated as a property value, but it can be considered as a category or type of property.
2. 1 order of magnitude: This is a quantitative measure of the increase in hole mobility.
3. increased hole mobility: This is a property value describing the improved ability of the material to conduct holes.
4. photovoltaic properties: This is a category or type of property related to the ability of the material to convert light into electricity.
5. obviously improved: This is a qualitative description of the improvement in photovoltaic properties.
6. centrosymmetric structure: This is a property value describing the symmetry of the NT structure.
7. straighter backbone: This is a property value describing the shape of the NT backbone.
8. more favorable side-chain placement: This is a property value describing the preferred arrangement of side chains in the NT structure.
9. axisymmetric BT structure: This is a property value describing the symmetry of the BT structure.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. 1 order of magnitude: This is a quantitative measure of the increase in hole mobility.
2. increased hole mobility: This is a property value describing the improved ability of the NT-based polymers to conduct holes.
3. obviously improved: This is a qualitative description of the improvement in the photovoltaic properties of NT-based polymers.
4. more favorable side-chain placement: This is a property value describing the preferred arrangement of side chains in the NT structure, which may contribute to the improved photovoltaic properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1 order of magnitude (increase in hole mobility) |
| increased hole mobility |
| obviously improved (photovoltaic properties) |
| more favorable side-chain placement |
